review: I ditched cable and after using a FireTV box on the large TV in my living room, and thinking it was the best thing since sliced bread, I just got the stick for tye small TV in my bedroom.  Love the stick!!  There have been no snags, no network drops (unless the fault was with the network) and performance has been seamless.  I can start watching something in the living room and finish it in the bedroom.  I use the toggle - you just pop the device into an HDMI port and you're good to go.  Awesome!  8)
